Data Analytics & Business Intelligence Consultant 
 

Seeking opportunities to be part of a growth-oriented Team working on wide range of emerging Data analytics and BI 
technologies to deliver innovative and insightful Analytics and Predictive solutions to Enterprises. Enthusiasm to work on 
Churning, profiling and modelling data and draw out useful insights which prove profitable for users.  

 

 

 

Data Analytics & Modelling Experience 

 

1. Hands on experience of data modelling and reporting in Power BI, SAC and Webi

3. Created various data models and calculation views in SAP HANA for effecting reporting in Power BI 
4. Extensive work on creating business-friendly descriptive reports using Power BI and connecting to internal sources and 

external data sources like SQL server, ODATA etc. 
5. Rich experience in BO activities such as SAP Universe import, modification and export in UDT/IDT. 
6. Investigation and tweaking/fine-tuning of existing reports to resolve end-user reporting and accessibility issues.

8. Worked in promotion management to migrate Reports/Dashboards/Folders and scheduling of reports in BO. 

 

Business Intelligence and DW Experience 

 

1. In-depth understanding of DW and Business Intelligence concepts such as Database, Schemas, ETL, Joins. 
2. Good experience of SAP Business Objects Data Services in creating and analyzing Jobs which involve multiple sources 

and targets mappings and various transformations, functions etc. 
3. Complete working experience of Batch Job scheduling, monitoring and maintenance using third party tool: Tidal 

Enterprise Scheduler. 
4. Implemented various performance-improvement practices in BODS to reduce the execution time of Jobs. 
5. Extensive practice of querying, investigating the DWH data through SQL Developer, Microsoft SQL Server, HANA Studio 

to resolve end-user data issues. 
6. Experience in SAP BODS and SAP BO patch upgrade on Windows platform from BODS 4.2 SP3 to SP10 involving 

metadata migration and configuration of Dev, QA and Prod environment 
7. Handled application support activities such as ticket management, breakfix, enhancements, RCA etc. 

 

 

Business Skills and Other Achievements 

 

1. Worked on a 6-month Onsite Assignment for UTC BI services at client location at New York, USA. 
2. Worked directly with the Business users, Customer Engagement Team, Leaders and other stakeholders. 
3. Fulfilled multi-dimensional role at Onsite by working as BODS Resource, BO Admin resource and working on a separate 

Initiative in Hadoop Big Data through BODS. 
4. Held regular discussion with clients and worked on data-reconciliation on existing environment to facilitate and 

automate their daily operations and proactively identify any deviations.

Achievements at EY

2. Received Advisory Highest Performing Team Award for FY17-18 for the project UTC BI Managed Services. 

 



 

 
MAJOR ASSIGNMENTS 

 
 

Warranty Data Analytics for United Technologies 

Client – United Technologies is a Global giant in cutting edge building solutions such as fire safety, heating & ventilation, 
refrigeration, building automation & security. The warranty services provided to customers across the globe incurs losses 
as huge percentage of revenue. A major area of concern for the company is to reduce direct and indirect losses by 
utilizing the Warranty data to manage the warranty costs, product quality and hence increase profitability as well as 
customer satisfaction. 

About the Project Client has daily transaction data as well as 10 years of archived data. Data is fragile, fragmented & 
inconsistent due to multiple sources as well as legacy systems. Objective is to extract, integrate and 
shape the data in HANA and provide prescriptive solutions for areas such as warranty cost per unit, 
defect trend analysis, fraudulent claim detection, product quality insights

from Hana system through Odata  

• Developed discrete models in Power BI to provide initial insights to client such as warranty cost 
by product, plant, type, sales and year.  

• Utilize Analytics capabilities of Power BI to draw insights from past 10 years data such as product 
failure trend, plant-product-failure correlation, customer trends, false claims, average product 
life.
